exceptions._comment: add promo:false to ALL cards with the intention of deleting them later
Each deck has one primary and two secondary commanders. They also included oversized foil versions of the same.
exceptions.where: title=(Oloro, Ageless Ascetic|Sharuum the Hegemon|Sphinx of the Steel Wind|    Marath, Will of the Wild|Gahiji, Honored One|Mayael the Anima|    Prossh, Skyraider of Kher|Sek'Kuar, Deathkeeper|Shattergang Brothers|    Jeleva, Nephalia's Scourge|Nekusar, the Mindrazer|Thraximundar|    Derevi, Empyrial Tactician|Roon of the Hidden Realm|Rubinia Soulsinger)

exceptions._comment: delete all cards that still have promo=false, which leaves just our promo cards
